name: Mammorest Cryst

ability.name: Ice Crusher
ability.description: Can be ridden. Improves efficiency of cutting trees and mining ores while mounted.

description: The vegetation on its back varies from individual to individual. There was a time when seeds of presumed extinct plants were found still frozen on the back of a Mammorest Cryst.

skills.name: Stone Cannon
skills.description: Digs up a boulder and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: Icicle Cutter
skills.description: Creates a crescent blade of ice and hurls it forward.

skills.name: Power Bomb
skills.description: Charges a massive amount of energy before firing a large destructive ball.

skills.name: Iceberg
skills.description: Summons a sharp ice lance under an enemy.

skills.name: Earth Impact
skills.description: Mammorest's exclusive skill. Uses massive body to shake the earth, dealing damage over a wide area.

skills.name: Cryst Breath
skills.description: Enshrouds an enemy in a frigid blast of air, dealing continuous damage.

skills.name: Blizzard Spike
skills.description: Creates a giant lump of ice and hurls it at an enemy. It deals damage to those in the surrounding area upon impact.
